document_data.name: Erimmator
document_data.mainbody: '''Erimmator''' was a mage working for the [[Cult of the Dragon]] in the early mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: At some point prior to the conception of [[Shandril Shessair]], thus, in {{yearlink|1339}} at the most,{{Cite web/Candlekeep Forum/The Hooded One (2004)/09-11 - Spellfire Timeline}}As Shandril is 16 years old in 16 Flamerule of 1356, she must've been born before 15 Flamerule 1340 and after 17 Flamerule 1339. The birthdate means she was conceived nine months prior, thus, before [[Marpenoth]] of 1339 and after [[Marpenoth]] of 1338. As the first range is wider, that one is accepted. Erimmator cursed an unwitting [[Garthond Shessair]] with a symbiotic [[balhiir]] during a spellbattle.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: [[Gorstag]] believed him dead as of {{yearlink|1357}}, though he didn't know where had he been buried. Together with [[Elminster]], they had concluded at some point that Erimmator had cursed Garthond with the symbiotic baalhiir. They believed this was to find out if any child he conceived with [[Dammasae]] would have stronger [[spellfire]] abilities than the mother.{{cite book/Spellfire/Paperback 2005||20}}
